abstract: The maker of Jimmy Dean sausages has received a preliminary bid from a group of buyout firms led by Apollo Global Management, and is expected to receive one from JBS of Brazil and the Blackstone Group.
snippet: The maker of Jimmy Dean sausages has received a preliminary bid from a group of buyout firms led by Apollo Global Management, and is expected to receive one from JBS of Brazil and the Blackstone Group.

headline.main: Sara Lee Weighs Future After Receiving Takeover Interest

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
